items.text: This feature requires at least version: ${minimumVersion}

items.label: ClearFocus
items.description: Removes focus from the actionable component that is currently in focus.

items.label: Finish
items.description: Closes the current APL document and exits.

items.label: delay
items.description: Delay time in milliseconds before this command executes. Must be non-negative.

items.label: description
items.description: Optional documentation for this command

items.label: type
items.description: Type of the command

items.label: when
items.description: Conditional expression. If this evaluates to false, the command is skipped.

items.label: componentId
items.description: The id of the component.

items.label: duration
items.description: The duration of the animation (in milliseconds)

items.label: easing
items.description: Specify an easing curve.

items.label: repeatCount
items.description: Number of times to repeat.

items.label: repeatMode
items.description: How repeated animations will play.

items.label: value
items.description: An array of animated component properties.

items.label: componentId
items.description: The id of the component.

items.label: count
items.description: The number of pages to display. Defaults to all of them.

items.label: duration
items.description: Time to wait between pages (in milliseconds).

items.label: delay
items.description: Delay time in milliseconds before this command executes.

items.label: onFail
items.description: Command to execute if the URL fails to open.

items.label: source
items.description: The URL to open.

items.label: commands
items.description: An unordered list of command to execute in parallel.

items.label: componentId
items.description: The id of the component.

items.label: distance
items.description: The number of pages to scroll.

items.label: align
items.description: The alignment of the item after scrolling.

items.label: componentId
items.description: The id of the component.

items.label: align
items.description: The alignment of the item after scrolling.

items.label: componentId
items.description: The id of the component.

items.label: index
items.description: The 0-based index of the child to display.

items.label: commands
items.description: An ordered list of commands to select from.

items.label: data
items.description: A list of data to map against the commands.

items.label: otherwise
items.description: An array of commands to execute if no command is selected from the commands array.

items.label: arguments
items.description: An array of argument data to pass to Alexa.

items.label: commands
items.description: An array of components to extract value data from and provide to Alexa.

items.label: catch
items.description: An ordered list of commands to execute if this sequence is prematurely terminated.

items.label: commands
items.description: An ordered list of command to execute in series.

items.label: finally
items.description: An ordered list of commands to execute after the normal commands and the catch commands.

items.label: repeatCount
items.description: The number of times to repeat this series of commands.

items.label: componentId
items.description: The id of the component which will receive focus

items.label: componentId
items.description: The id of the component.

items.label: position
items.description: Whether the value is a relative or absolute offset.

items.label: value
items.description: The distance to move. May be an absolute or relative value.

items.label: componentId
items.description: The id of the component whose value should be set.

items.label: state
items.description: The name of the state to set.

items.label: value
items.description: The value to set on the state.

items.label: componentId
items.description: The id of the component whose value should be set.

items.label: property
items.description: The name of the property to set.

items.label: value
items.description: The value to set on the property.

items.label: align
items.description: The alignment of the item after scrolling.

items.label: componentId
items.description: The id of the component.

items.label: highlightMode
items.description: How karaoke is applied: on a line-by-line basis, or to the entire block.

items.label: minimumDwellTime
items.description: The minimum number of milliseconds that an item will be highlighted.

items.label: align
items.description: The alignment of the item after scrolling.

items.label: componentId
items.description: The id of the Sequence or Container (or any other hosting component).

items.label: count
items.description: The number of children to read.

items.label: minimumDwellTime
items.description: The minimum number of milliseconds that an item will be highlighted.

items.label: start
items.description: The index of the item to start reading.

items.label: command
items.description: Command to issue on the media player

items.label: componentId
items.description: Name of the media playing component.

items.label: value
items.description: Optional data value

items.label: audioTrack
items.description: Audio track to play on.

items.label: componentId
items.description: Name of the media playing component.

items.label: source
items.description: Media source

items.label: handleKeyDown
items.description: Keyboard handler(s) to evaluate when the component receives a key down.

items.label: handleKeyUp
items.description: Keyboard handler(s) to evaluate when the component receives a key up.

items.label: onBlur
items.description: Command to execute when the component loses focus.

items.label: onFocus
items.description: Command to execute when the component receives focus.

items.label: accessibilityLabel
items.description: Voice-over will read this string when the user selects this component

items.label: bind
items.description: Expressions to add to the data binding context

items.label: checked
items.description: If true, this component has the checked state set.

items.label: description
items.description: Optional description of this component

items.label: disabled
items.description: If true, this component does not respond to touch or focus.

items.label: display
items.description: Determines whether the component is displayed on the screen.

items.label: entity
items.description: Opaque data used to clarify references in Alexa.

items.label: height
items.description: The requested height of the component.

items.label: id
items.description: Reference name of the component, used for navigation and events.

items.label: inheritParentState
items.description: When true, use the parent's state.

items.label: maxHeight
items.description: The maximum allowed height of this component.

items.label: maxWidth
items.description: The maximum allowed width of this component.

items.label: minHeight
items.description: The minimum allowed height of this component.

items.label: minWidth
items.description: The minimum allowed width of this component.

items.label: onCursorEnter
items.description: Command(s) to execute when a cursor (mouse pointer) enters the component's active region.

items.label: onCursorExit
items.description: Command(s) to execute when a cursor (mouse pointer) exits the component's active region.

items.label: onMount
items.description: Command to execute when the component is first displayed.

items.label: opacity
items.description: Opacity of this component and children.

items.label: paddingBottom
items.description: Space to add to the bottom of this component.

items.label: paddingLeft
items.description: Space to add to the left of this component.

items.label: paddingRight
items.description: Space to add to the right of this component.

items.label: paddingTop
items.description: Space to add to the top of this component.

items.label: shadowColor
items.description: Shadow color

items.label: shadowHorizontalOffset
items.description: Horizontal offset of the shadow

items.label: shadowRadius
items.description: Shadow blur radius

items.label: shadowVerticalOffset
items.description: Vertical offset of the shadow

items.label: speech
items.description: Transformed speech information for audio playback

items.label: style
items.description: Named style or styles to apply.

items.label: transform
items.description: Array of transformations.

items.label: type
items.description: The type of the component.

items.label: when
items.description: If it evaluates to false, this component does not inflate.

items.label: width
items.description: The requested width of this component.

items.label: alignItems
items.description: Alignment for children in the cross-axis.

items.label: data
items.description: Data to bind into this container.

items.label: direction
items.description: Direction that children will be laid out in.

items.label: firstItem
items.description: Component to include before all others.

items.label: item(s)
items.description: Component(s) used to lay out the data set.

items.label: justifyContent
items.description: How to distribute free space when there is room on the main axis. Defaults to start.

items.label: lastItem
items.description: Component to include after all others.

items.label: numbered
items.description: If true, assign ordinal numbers to children. Defaults to false.

items.label: backgroundColor
items.description: Background color.

items.label: borderBottomLeftRadius
items.description: Radius of the bottom-left corner. Overrides borderRadius.

items.label: borderBottomRightRadius
items.description: Radius of the bottom-right corner. Overrides borderRadius.

items.label: borderColor
items.description: Color of the border.

items.label: borderRadius
items.description: Corner radius for rounded-rectangle variant.

items.label: borderTopLeftRadius
items.description: Radius of the top-left corner. Overrides borderRadius if specified.

items.label: borderTopRightRadius
items.description: Radius of the top-right corner. Overrides borderRadius if specified.

items.label: borderWidth
items.description: Width of the border.

items.label: item
items.description: Child component

items.label: align
items.description: Alignment of the image within the containing box.

items.label: borderRadius
items.description: Clipping radius for the image.

items.label: borderTopLeftRadius
items.description: Radius of the top-left corner. Overrides borderRadius if specified.

items.label: borderTopRightRadius
items.description: Radius of the top-right corner. Overrides borderRadius if specified.

items.label: borderWidth
items.description: Width of the border.

items.label: filter(s)
items.description: Filters to apply to the image.

items.label: overlayColor
items.description: If set, a theme-appropriate scrim is overlaid on the image. This ensures text placed on the image is legible.

items.label: overlayGradient
items.description: A colored gradient that overlays the image.

items.label: scale
items.description: How the image will be resized to fit in the bounding box.

items.label: source
items.description: URL to download the image from.

items.label: data
items.description: Data to bind into this container.

items.label: firstItem
items.description: A component to include before all others.

items.label: initialPage
items.description: The index of the starting page (0-based).

items.label: item(s)
items.description: The Component(s) used to lay out the data set.

items.label: lastItem
items.description: A component to include after all others.

items.label: navigation
items.description: Specifies the allowed navigation direction.

items.label: onPageChanged
items.description: Commands to execute when the page changes.

items.label: item(s)
items.description: The Component displayed in the ScrollView.

items.label: onScroll
items.description: Command to execute during scrolling.

items.label: data
items.description: Data to bind into this container.

items.label: firstItem
items.description: A component to include before all others.

items.label: item(s)
items.description: The component(s) used to lay out the data set.

items.label: lastItem
items.description: A component to include after all others.

items.label: numbered
items.description: If true, assign ordinal numbers to children in the data-binding context.

items.label: onScroll
items.description: Command to execute during scrolling

items.label: scrollDirection
items.description: The direction to scroll this sequence.

items.label: color
items.description: The color of the text.

items.label: fontFamily
items.description: Font family (such as \"Amazon Ember Display\").

items.label: fontSize
items.description: The size of the text.

items.label: fontStyle
items.description: The font style to display.

items.label: fontWeight
items.description: The font weight to display.

items.label: letterSpacing
items.description: Additional space to add between letters.

items.label: lineHeight
items.description: Line-height multiplier.

items.label: maxLines
items.description: The maximum number of lines of text to display. The text will be truncated with an ellipsis if not all text is visible.

items.label: text
items.description: The markup to display in this text box. If this value is set to null or an empty string "", no content appears.

items.label: textAlign
items.description: Alignment of text within a paragraph.

items.label: textAlignVertical
items.description: Vertical alignment of text.

items.label: item
items.description: Child item to display.

items.label: onPress
items.description: Command to fire when this component is pressed. You can use any commands in the onPress handler.

items.label: align
items.description: Alignment of the vector graphic within the component.

items.label: scale
items.description: How the vector graphic will scale up or down within the component.

items.label: scale
items.description: How the vector graphic will scale up or down within the component.

items.label: source
items.description: The URL or direct reference to a vector graphic.

items.label: audioTrack
items.description: Audio track to play on.

items.label: autoplay
items.description: If true, automatically start playing the video.

items.label: onEnd
items.description: Commands to execute when the last video track is finished playing.

items.label: onPause
items.description: TCommands to execute when the video switches from playing to paused.

items.label: onPlay
items.description: Commands to execute when the video switches from paused to playing.

items.label: onTimeUpdate
items.description: Commands to execute when the playback position changes.

items.label: onTrackUpdate
items.description: Commands to execute when the current video track changes.

items.label: scale
items.description: How the video should scale to fill the space.

items.label: source(s)
items.description: Video source or sources.

items.label: description
items.description: Optional description of the data source.

items.label: objectID
items.description: An optional identifier for an object data source.

items.label: properties
items.description: An object containing bindable properties that can be used with transformers.

items.label: transformers
items.description: An array of transformers that are applied to values in the properties object.

items.label: type
items.description: Must be "object".

items.label: items
items.description: Array of object data of the first items to render (with the leading element indexed at startIndex). Alexa displays the leading item at the top/left of the visible list area.

items.label: listId
items.description: Identifier to distinguish between different datasources in the same APL document.

items.label: maximumExclusiveIndex
items.description: The last index of the array, exclusive.

items.label: minimumInclusiveIndex
items.description: The index of the first item in the array, inclusive.

items.label: startIndex
items.description: Index of the leading item in the items array. Specify a non-zero value to start the experience at an arbitrary offset.

items.label: type
items.description: "dynamicIndexList".

items.label: agentName
items.description: Name of the runtime environment.

items.label: agentVersion
items.description: Version of the runtime environment.

items.label: allowOpenURL
items.description: True if the OpenURL command is enabled.

items.label: animation
items.description: Animation characteristics of the runtime.

items.label: aplVersion
items.description: Supported version of APL.

items.label: disallowVideo
items.description: True if the Video component is disabled.

items.label: Math.abs(x)
items.description: The absolute value of x

items.label: Math.acos(x)
items.description: The arccosine of x

items.label: Math.asin(x)
items.description: The arcsine of x

items.label: Math.atan(x)
items.description: The arctangent of x

items.label: Math.ceil(x)
items.description: The smallest integer greater than or equal to x.

items.label: Math.clamp(x, y, z)
items.description: Return x if y<x, z if y>z and otherwise y.

items.label: Math.cos(x)
items.description: The cosine of x

items.label: Math.floor(x)
items.description: The largest integer less than or equal to x.

items.label: Math.max(x1, x2, ...)
items.description: The largest argument

items.label: Math.min(x1, x2, ...)
items.description: The smallest argument

items.label: Math.PI
items.description: The value of π (PI)

items.label: Math.random()
items.description: A random number between 0 and 1

items.label: Math.round(x)
items.description: Return the nearest integer to x

items.label: Math.sign(x)
items.description: The sign of x: -1, 0, or +1

items.label: Math.sin(x)
items.description: The sine of x

items.label: Math.sqrt(x)
items.description: The square root of x

items.label: Math.tan(x)
items.description: The tangent of x

items.label: String.slice(x, y[, z])
items.description: Return the subset of x starting at index y and extending to but not including index z. If z is omitted, the remainder of the string is returned. If y is a negative number, select from the end of the string.

items.label: String.toLowerCase(x)
items.description: Lowercase the string

items.label: String.toUpperCase(x)
items.description: Uppercase the string

items.label: Time.date(x)
items.description: The date of the month (1-31)

items.label: Time.format(f, x)
items.description: A formatted text string

items.label: Time.hours(x)
items.description: The hour of the day (0-23)

items.label: Time.milliseconds(x)
items.description: The milliseconds (0-999)

items.label: Time.minutes(x)
items.description: The minutes of the hour (0-59)

items.label: Time.month(x)
items.description: The month (from 0-11)

items.label: Time.seconds(x)
items.description: The seconds in the minute (0-59)

items.label: Time.weekDay(x)
items.description: The day of the week (0-6)

items.label: Time.year(x)
items.description: The year

items.label: dpi
items.description: Pixel density of the viewport.

items.label: height
items.description: Height of the viewport in dp.

items.label: mode
items.description: The operating mode.

items.label: pixelHeight
items.description: Height of the viewport in pixels.

items.label: pixelWidth
items.description: Width of the viewport in pixels.

items.label: shape
items.description: Shape of the viewport.

items.label: theme
items.description: The preferred color scheme

items.label: width
items.description: Width of the viewport in dp.

items.label: ssmlToSpeech transformer
items.description: The ssmlToSpeech transformer converts an SSML string into a speakable entity.

items.label: ssmlToText transformer
items.description: The SSML to text transformer converts a full SSML text string into text that is more appropriate for human reading by removing the SSML markup.

items.label: textToHint transformer
items.description: The textToHint transformer converts the input to a hint with the correct user-configured wake word for the device (Try "Alexa, This is the hint").

items.label: textToSpeech transformer
items.description: The textToSpeech transformer converts a plain text string into a speakable entity.

items.label: inputPath
items.description: Path within the object to the part to be transformed.

items.label: outputName
items.description: Name of the property to be added to the object.

items.label: transformer
items.description: The name of the transformer.

items.label: description
items.description: Optional description of this vector graphic.

items.label: height
items.description: The height of the graphic.

items.label: item(s)
items.description: An array of drawing items. Each item is either a GROUP or a PATH

items.label: parameters
items.description: An array of parameter values that can be set on the AVG object.

items.label: scaleTypeHeight
items.description: How the viewport height changes as the height scales.

items.label: scaleTypeWidth
items.description: How the viewport width changes as the width scales.

items.label: type
items.description: The type of vector graphic.

items.label: version
items.description: The current release version of the AVG standard.

items.label: viewportHeight
items.description: The height of the viewport.

items.label: viewportWidth
items.description: The width of the viewport.

items.label: width
items.description: The width of the graphic.

items.label: fill
items.description: The fill color.

items.label: fillOpacity
items.description: The opacity of the path fill.

items.label: pathData
items.description: The path drawing data.

items.label: stroke
items.description: The color used to draw the stroke.

items.label: strokeOpacity
items.description: The opacity of the path stroke.

items.label: strokeWidth
items.description: The width of the path stroke.

items.label: type
items.description: Must be set to "path".

items.label: item(s)
items.description: Array of child drawing items.

items.label: opacity
items.description: The opacity of the group.

items.label: pivotX
items.description: X-coordinate of the rotation pivot point (viewport coordinates).

items.label: pivotY
items.description: Y-coordinate of the rotation pivot point (viewport coordinates).

items.label: rotation
items.description: Rotation angle of the group, in degrees.

items.label: scaleX
items.description: Scaling factor on the X-axis.

items.label: scaleY
items.description: Scaling factor on the Y-axis.

items.label: translateX
items.description: X-coordinate translation (viewport coordinates).

items.label: translateY
items.description: Y-coordinate translation (viewport coordinates).

items.label: type
items.description: Must be set to "group".

items.label: Absolute dimensions
items.description: Absolute dimensions are integers interpreted as display-independent pixels.

items.label: Relative dimensions
items.description: Relative dimensions are represented by a string of the form "X%", where X is a valid JSON number.

items.label: Special dimensions
items.description: Special dimensions are named values that have special processing.

items.label: Hexadecimal color
items.description: A color may be defined as a #-prefixed hexadecimal string.

items.label: HSL / HSLA function
items.description: A color may be defined as an hsl() or hsla() function (the second is an alias for the first).

items.label: RGB / RGBA function
items.description: A color may be defined as an rgb() or rgba() function (the second is an alias for the first).

items.label: Standard colors
items.description: A standard color is a named reference from the HTML standard.

items.label: Transparent
items.description: A color may be defined as the keyword "transparent".

items.label: angle
items.description: Angle of a linear gradient, in degrees. 0 is up, 90 is to the right.

items.label: colorRange
items.description: The color to assign at each gradient stop.

items.label: description
items.description: Optional description of this gradient.

items.label: inputRange
items.description: The input stops of the gradient. Must be in ascending order with values between 0 and 1.

items.label: type
items.description: The type of the gradient.

items.label: radius
items.description: Radius of the blur effect

items.label: type
items.description: Defines the type of filter

items.label: kind
items.description: The probability distribution used to generate the noise.

items.label: sigma
items.description: Standard deviation of the noise.

items.label: type
items.description: Defines the type of filter

items.label: useColor
items.description: If true, colored noise will be used. If false, monochromatic.

items.label: background
items.description: Override standard background color

items.label: commands
items.description: Command definitions

items.label: export
items.description: An optional list of elements intended to be used by an external package or document.

items.label: graphics
items.description: The graphics property defines a collection of named vector graphics you can use within the document.

items.label: handleKeyDown
items.description: A list of keyboard event handlers to execute when a key is pressed on the keyboard.

items.label: handleKeyUp
items.description: A list of keyboard event handlers to execute when a key is released on the keyboard.

items.label: import
items.description: A list of references to external APL packages.

items.label: layouts
items.description: Custom layouts.

items.label: mainTemplate
items.description: The starting layout.

items.label: onMount
items.description: Command to execute when the document is first displayed.

items.label: resources
items.description: Resource definitions.

items.label: settings
items.description: Document-wide settings.

items.label: styles
items.description: Style definitions.

items.label: theme
items.description: Document-specified theme

items.label: description
items.description: A description of this layout

items.label: item
items.description: The component to inflate. If an array is passed, the first item with a matching when clause will be inflated.

items.label: parameters
items.description: An array of parameters that can be passed to this layout.

items.label: default
items.description: The default value to apply if this parameter is not specified. Defaults to empty.

items.label: description
items.description: A user-provided description of the purpose of this parameter.

items.label: name
items.description: The parameter name.

items.label: type
items.description: The type of the parameter. Defaults to "any".

items.label: boolean
items.description: Mapping from boolean name to boolean value.

items.label: color(s)
items.description: Mapping from color name to color value.

items.label: description
items.description: Description of this resource block.

items.label: dimension(s)
items.description: Mapping from dimension name to dimension value.

items.label: string(s)
items.description: Mapping from a name to a string.

items.label: when
items.description: If true, this resource block will be included. Defaults to true.

items.label: checked
items.description: The component has been checked or toggled on

items.label: disabled
items.description: Component has been disabled (many components have a "disabled" property).

items.label: focused
items.description: Component has the keyboard input focus

items.label: hover
items.description: The component has a cursor (mouse pointer) over the active input region.

items.label: karaoke
items.description: The component is being spoken by a speech command

items.label: karaokeTarget
items.description: An element within the component is the specific target for a current speech command.

items.label: pressed
items.description: Mouse or touch input is active.
